00204 BOOLEAN EnterAimPolicies()
00205 {
00206   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00207 
00208       InitAimDefaults();
00209 
00210       gubCurPageNum = (UINT8) giCurrentSubPage;
00211 
00212       gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded = FALSE;
00213       gfExitingAimPolicy = FALSE;
00214 
00215       gubPoliciesAgreeButtonDown = 255;
00216       gubAimPolicyMenuButtonDown    = 255;
00217 
00218       if( gubCurPageNum != 0)
00219             InitAimPolicyMenuBar();
00220 
00221       gfInPolicyToc = FALSE;
00222 
00223       // load the Bottom Buttons graphic and add it
00224       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00225       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BottomButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00226       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBottomButton));
00227 
00228       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00229       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BottomButton2.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00230       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBottomButton2));
00231 
00232       // load the Content Buttons graphic and add it
00233       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00234       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ContentButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00235       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiContentButton));
00236 
00237       RenderAimPolicies();
00238       return(TRUE);
00239 }
00240 
00241 void ExitAimPolicies()
00242 {
00243       gfExitingAimPolicy = TRUE;
00244 
00245       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBottomButton);
00246       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBottomButton2);
00247       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiContentButton);
00248 
00249       if( gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded )
00250             ExitAimPolicyMenuBar();
00251 
00252       if(gfInPolicyToc)
00253             ExitAimPolicyTocMenu();
00254       
00255       if( gfInAgreementPage )
00256             ExitAgreementButton();        
00257       RemoveAimDefaults();
00258 
00259       giCurrentSubPage = gubCurPageNum;
00260 
00261 }
00262 
00263 void HandleAimPolicies()
00264 {
00265       if( (gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded != TRUE) && gubCurPageNum != 0)
00266       {
00267             InitAimPolicyMenuBar();
00268 //          RenderAimPolicies();
00269             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00270       }
00271 
00272 }
00273 
00274 void RenderAimPolicies()
00275 {
00276       UINT16      usNumPixles;
00277 
00278       DrawAimDefaults();
00279 
00280       DisplayAimPolicyTitleText();
00281 
00282       if( gfInAgreementPage )
00283             ExitAgreementButton();        
00284 
00285       switch( gubCurPageNum )
00286       {
00287             case 0:
00288                   DisplayAimPolicyStatement();
00289                   InitAgreementRegion();
00290                   break;
00291 
00292             case 1:
00293                   InitAimPolicyTocMenu();
00294                   InitAimPolicyMenuBar();
00295                   DisableAimPolicyButton();
00296                   DrawAimPolicyMenu();
00297                   break;
00298 
00299             case 2:
00300                   //Display the Definitions title
00301                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, DEFINITIONS, (FLOAT)1.0);
00302                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00303                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, DEFINITIONS_1, (FLOAT)1.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00304                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, DEFINITIONS_2, (FLOAT)1.2) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00305                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, DEFINITIONS_3, (FLOAT)1.3) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00306                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, DEFINITIONS_4, (FLOAT)1.4);
00307                   break;
00308 
00309             case 3:
00310                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT, (FLOAT)2.0);
00311                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00312                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT_1, (FLOAT)2.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00313                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT_1_1, (FLOAT)2.11) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00314                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT_1_2, (FLOAT)2.12) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00315                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT_1_3, (FLOAT)2.13) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00316                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT_2, (FLOAT)2.2) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00317                   break;
00318 
00319             case 4:
00320                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT, (FLOAT)3.0);
00321                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00322                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_1, (FLOAT)3.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00323                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2, (FLOAT)3.2) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00324 
00325                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2_1, (FLOAT)3.21) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00326                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2_2, (FLOAT)3.22) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00327                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2_3, (FLOAT)3.23) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00328 //                usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicySubParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2_4, (FLOAT)3.24) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00329 
00330                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_2_4, (FLOAT)3.3) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00331 
00332                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT_3, (FLOAT)3.4) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00333                   break;
00334 
00335             case 5:
00336                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, CONTRACT_EXTENSIONS, (FLOAT)4.0);
00337                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00338                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, CONTRACT_EXTENSIONS_1, (FLOAT)4.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;

00340                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, CONTRACT_EXTENSIONS_3, (FLOAT)4.3) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00341                   break;
00342 
00343             case 6:
00344                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, TERMS_OF_PAYMENT, (FLOAT)5.0);
00345                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00346                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, TERMS_OF_PAYMENT_1, (FLOAT)5.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00347                   break;
00348

00350                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, TERMS_OF_ENGAGEMENT, (FLOAT)6.0);
00351                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00352                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, TERMS_OF_ENGAGEMENT_1, (FLOAT)6.1) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;

00354                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, TERMS_OF_ENGAGEMENT_2B, (FLOAT)0.0) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00355                   break;
00356 
00357             case 8:

00372                   break;
00373 
00374             case 10:
00375                   DisableAimPolicyButton();
00376 
00377                   DisplayAimPolicyTitle(AIM_POLICY_SUBTITLE_Y, POLICY_MEDICAL, (FLOAT)9.0);
00378                   usNumPixles = AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_Y;

00383                   usNumPixles += DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(usNumPixles, POLICY_MEDICAL_4, (FLOAT)9.4) + AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_GAP;
00384                   break;
00385       }
00386 
00387   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00388 
00389       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00390

00396 BOOLEAN InitAimPolicyMenuBar(void)
00397 {
00398       UINT16                              i, usPosX;
00399 
00400       if(gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded)
00401             return(TRUE);
00402 
00403       //Load graphic for buttons
00404       guiPoliciesMenuButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BottomButtons2.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00405 
00406       usPosX = AIM_POLICY_MENU_X;
00407       for(i=0; i<AIM_POLICY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00408       {
00409 
00410 //          guiPoliciesMenuButton[i] = QuickCreateButton(guiPoliciesMenuButtonImage, usPosX, AIM_POLICY_MENU_Y,
00411 //                                                                                                    BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00412 //                                                                                                    DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnPoliciesMenuButtonCallback);
00413 //          SetButtonCursor(guiPoliciesMenuButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00414 //          MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiPoliciesMenuButton[i], 0, i);
00415 
00416             guiPoliciesMenuButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiPoliciesMenuButtonImage, AimPolicyText[i], FONT10ARIAL, 
00417                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00418                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00419                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00420                                                                                      usPosX, AIM_POLICY_MENU_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00421                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnPoliciesMenuButtonCallback);
00422             SetButtonCursor(guiPoliciesMenuButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00423             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiPoliciesMenuButton[i], 0, i);
00424             
00425 
00426 
00427             usPosX += AIM_POLICY_GAP_X;
00428       }
00429 
00430 
00431 
00432 
00433       gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded = TRUE;
00434 
00435       return(TRUE);
00436 }
00437 
00438 BOOLEAN ExitAimPolicyMenuBar(void)
00439 {
00440       int i;
00441 
00442       if( !gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded ) 
00443             return( FALSE );
00444 
00445       for(i=0; i<AIM_POLICY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00446             RemoveButton( guiPoliciesMenuButton[i]);
00447 
00448       UnloadButtonImage( guiPoliciesMenuButtonImage );
00449 
00450       gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded = FALSE;
00451 
00452       return(TRUE);
00453 }

00456 
00457 BOOLEAN DrawAimPolicyMenu()
00458 {
00459       UINT16                  i, usPosY;
00460       UINT16                  usHeight;
00461       UINT32                  uiStartLoc=0;
00462       wchar_t                 sText[400];
00463   HVOBJECT        hContentButtonHandle;
00464       UINT8                   ubLocInFile[]=          
00465                                                 {     DEFINITIONS,
00466                                                       LENGTH_OF_ENGAGEMENT,
00467                                                       LOCATION_0F_ENGAGEMENT,
00468                                                       CONTRACT_EXTENSIONS,
00469                                                       TERMS_OF_PAYMENT,
00470                                                       TERMS_OF_ENGAGEMENT,
00471                                                       ENGAGEMENT_TERMINATION,
00472                                                       EQUIPMENT_AND_INVENTORY,
00473                                                       POLICY_MEDICAL};
00474 
00475       GetVideoObject(&hContentButtonHandle, guiContentButton);
00476 
00477       usHeight = GetFontHeight(AIM_POLICY_TOC_FONT);
00478       usPosY = AIM_POLICY_TOC_Y;
00479       for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_POLICY_TOC_BUTTONS; i++)
00480       {
00481         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hContentButtonHandle, 0,AIM_POLICY_TOC_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00482 
00483             uiStartLoc = AIM_POLICY_LINE_SIZE * ubLocInFile[i];
00484             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMPOLICYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00485             DrawTextToScreen(sText, AIM_POLICY_TOC_X + AIM_POLICY_TOC_TEXT_OFFSET_X, (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_POLICY_TOC_TEXT_OFFSET_Y), AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_WIDTH, AIM_POLICY_TOC_FONT, AIM_POLICY_TOC_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00486 
00487             usPosY += AIM_POLICY_TOC_GAP_Y;
00488       }
00489       gfInPolicyToc = TRUE;
00490 
00491       return(TRUE);
00492 }
00493 
00494 BOOLEAN InitAimPolicyTocMenu(void)
00495 {
00496       UINT16                  i, usPosY;
00497       UINT16                  usHeight;
00498       UINT32                  uiStartLoc=0;
00499 
00500       if(gfInPolicyToc)
00501             return(TRUE);
00502 
00503       usHeight = GetFontHeight(AIM_POLICY_TOC_FONT);
00504       usPosY = AIM_POLICY_TOC_Y;
00505       for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_POLICY_TOC_BUTTONS; i++)
00506       {
00507             //Mouse region for the toc buttons
00508             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedPolicyTocMenuRegion[i], AIM_POLICY_TOC_X, usPosY, (UINT16)(AIM_POLICY_TOC_X + AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00509                                                  CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectPolicyTocMenuRegionCallBack); 
00510             MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedPolicyTocMenuRegion[i]); 
00511             MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedPolicyTocMenuRegion[i], 0, i+2);
00512 
00513             usPosY += AIM_POLICY_TOC_GAP_Y;
00514       }
00515       gfInPolicyToc = TRUE;
00516 
00517       return(TRUE);
00518 }
00519 
00520 
00521 
00522 BOOLEAN ExitAimPolicyTocMenu()
00523 {
00524       UINT16 i;
00525 
00526       gfInPolicyToc = FALSE;
00527       for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_POLICY_TOC_BUTTONS; i++)
00528             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedPolicyTocMenuRegion[i]);
00529 
00530       return(TRUE);
00531 }

00534 
00535 void SelectPolicyTocMenuRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00536 { 
00537       if(gfInPolicyToc)
00538       {
00539             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00540             {
00541             }
00542             else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00543             {
00544                   gubCurPageNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00545 
00546                   ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00547 
00548                   ExitAimPolicyTocMenu();
00549                   ResetAimPolicyButtons();
00550                   DisableAimPolicyButton();
00551             }
00552             else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00553             {
00554             }
00555       }
00556 }

00609       for(i=0; i < 2; i++)

00611 //          guiPoliciesAgreeButton[i] = QuickCreateButton(guiPoliciesButtonImage, usPosX, AIM_POLICY_AGREEMENT_Y,
00612 //                                                                                                    BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00613 //                                                                                                    BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnPoliciesAgreeButtonCallback);
00614 //          SetButtonCursor(guiPoliciesAgreeButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00615 //          MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiPoliciesAgreeButton[i], 0, i);
00616

00618                                                                                      AIM_POLICY_AGREE_TOC_COLOR_ON, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00619                                                                                      AIM_POLICY_AGREE_TOC_COLOR_OFF, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00620                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED,

00622                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnPoliciesAgreeButtonCallback);
00623             SetButtonCursor(guiPoliciesAgreeButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00624             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiPoliciesAgreeButton[i], 0, i);
00625             
00626 
00627

00629       }
00630       gfInAgreementPage = TRUE;
00631       return(TRUE);
00632 }

00666 UINT16 DisplayAimPolicyParagraph(UINT16 usPosY, UINT8 ubPageNum, FLOAT fNumber)
00667 {
00668       wchar_t     sText[400];
00669       wchar_t     sTemp[20];

00672 
00673       uiStartLoc = AIM_POLICY_LINE_SIZE * ubPageNum;
00674       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMPOLICYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_POLICY_LINE_SIZE);
00675 
00676       if(fNumber != 0.0)
00677       {
00678             //Display the section number
00679             swprintf(sTemp, L"%2.1f", fNumber);
00680             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_NUMBER, usPosY, 0, AIM_POLICY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_POLICY_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00681       }
00682 
00683       //Display the text beside the section number
00684       usNumPixels = DisplayWrappedString(AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_X, usPosY, AIM_POLICY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_POLICY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_POLICY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00685 
00686       return(usNumPixels);

00710 
00711 
00712 void BtnPoliciesAgreeButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00713 {
00714       UINT8 ubRetValue;
00715       static BOOLEAN fOnPage=TRUE;
00716       if(fOnPage)
00717       {
00718             ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00719             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00720             {
00721                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00722                   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00723                   gubPoliciesAgreeButtonDown = ubRetValue;
00724             }
00725 
00726             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00727             {
00728                   if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00729                   {
00730                         btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00731 
00732                         //Agree
00733                         fOnPage = FALSE;
00734                         if(ubRetValue == 1)
00735                         {
00736                               gubCurPageNum++;
00737                               ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00738                         }
00739 
00740                         //Disagree
00741                         else
00742                         {
00743                               guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
00744                         }
00745                         InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00746                         fOnPage = TRUE;
00747                         gubPoliciesAgreeButtonDown = 255;
00748                   }
00749             }
00750             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00751             {
00752                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00753                   gubPoliciesAgreeButtonDown = 255;
00754                   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00755             }
00756       } 
00757 }
00758 
00759 void BtnPoliciesMenuButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00760 {
00761       UINT8 ubRetValue;
00762       static BOOLEAN fOnPage=TRUE;
00763       if(fOnPage)
00764       {
00765             ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00766             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00767             {
00768                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00769                   gubAimPolicyMenuButtonDown    = ubRetValue;
00770                   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00771             }
00772 
00773             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00774             {
00775                   if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00776                   {
00777                         btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00778 
00779                         gubAimPolicyMenuButtonDown    = 255;
00780                         //If previous Page
00781                         if( ubRetValue == 0 )
00782                         {
00783                               if( gubCurPageNum > 1)
00784                               {
00785                                     gubCurPageNum--;
00786                                     ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00787                               }
00788                         }
00789 
00790                         // Home Page
00791                         else if( ubRetValue == 1 )
00792                         {
00793                               guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
00794                         }
00795 
00796                         //Company policies index
00797                         else if( ubRetValue == 2 )
00798                         {
00799                               if( gubCurPageNum != 1 )
00800                               {
00801                                     gubCurPageNum=1;
00802                                     ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00803                               }
00804                         }
00805 
00806                         //Next Page
00807                         else if( ubRetValue == 3 )
00808                         {
00809                               if( gubCurPageNum < NUM_AIM_POLICY_PAGES-1 )
00810                               {
00811                                     gubCurPageNum++;
00812                                     ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00813 
00814                                     fOnPage = FALSE;
00815                                     if(gfInPolicyToc)
00816                                     {
00817                                           ExitAimPolicyTocMenu();
00818                                     }
00819                                     fOnPage = TRUE;
00820                               }
00821                         }
00822                         InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00823                         ResetAimPolicyButtons();
00824                         DisableAimPolicyButton();
00825                         fOnPage = TRUE;
00826                   }
00827             }
00828             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00829             {
00830                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00831                   gubAimPolicyMenuButtonDown    = 255;
00832                   DisableAimPolicyButton();
00833                   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00834             }
00835       } 
00836 }
00837 
00838 
00839 void ResetAimPolicyButtons()
00840 {
00841       int i=0;
00842 
00843       for(i=0; i<AIM_POLICY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00844       {
00845             ButtonList[ guiPoliciesMenuButton[i] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON; 
00846       }
00847 }
00848 
00849 
00850 void DisableAimPolicyButton()
00851 {
00852       if( gfExitingAimPolicy == TRUE || gfAimPolicyMenuBarLoaded == FALSE )
00853             return;
00854 
00855       if( (gubCurPageNum == AIM_POLICY_TOC_PAGE ) )
00856       {
00857             ButtonList[ guiPoliciesMenuButton[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00858             ButtonList[ guiPoliciesMenuButton[ 2 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00859       }
00860       else if(  ( gubCurPageNum == AIM_POLICY_LAST_PAGE ) ) 
00861       {
00862             ButtonList[ guiPoliciesMenuButton[ 3 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00863       }
00864 }
00865 
00866 
00867 void ChangingAimPoliciesSubPage( UINT8 ubSubPageNumber )
00868 {
00869       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00870 
00871       if( AimPoliciesSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] == FALSE )
00872       {
00873             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00874             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
00875 
00876             AimPoliciesSubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] = TRUE;
00877       }
00878       else
00879       {
00880             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00881             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
00882       }
00883 }
